Package kingdom

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Castle
    Class that represents a castle
    Constants
    Class of constants
    Door
    Class that represents a door A door is basically a number which represents its rotation to be display: 0 is Left, 1 is Up, 2 is Right, 3 is Down
    Duke
    Class that represents a duke owner
    IABasic
    Class managing the AI
    Kingdom
    Class that represents the kingdom of the game
    Order
    Class that represents an order An order is an ost in creation in the castle
    Ost
    Class that represents an ost An ost is a group of units which can attack or transfer troops in another castle
    Production
    Class that represents a production A production is what happens when you create a unit or want an upgrade of the castle
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ProdException
    Class that represents a ProdException exception it is threw when a production is launched although another production is processed
